title: Paniponi Dash, Vol. 2: Girls N Roses [DVD]
description: Ten year old MIT grad Rebecca Miyamoto may be a genius, but thats no guarantee she can handle a high school class especially one full of weirdos and flakes! It will take all of Rebeccas brains and determination to keep her class in line (and keep us laughing all the way through). A booklet, reversible cover, and loads of on-disc extras round out one of the years most highly-anticipated anime releases. Dont miss out!
